unnormalised: Okay, so return policies, right? It's like buying sweets for Diwali! If the laddu is bad, can I take it back? Many e-commerce sites are good now. I bought a saree online, didn't like it, returned it no problem. My cousin Priya in Chennai had an issue once though; store refused a return. Like they had served stale biryani! Hope things improve.
